Busra Holdings

Prepared:

Busra Holdings

A tailored growth strategy for Busra Holdings

Executive Summary

Executive Summary

Busra Holdings, your valuable contact data is the backbone of your business development efforts. However, outdated, inaccurate, or incomplete contact information can severely hinder your sales and marketing campaigns, leading to wasted time, resources, and missed opportunities.

Expandia proposes a streamlined solution: Comprehensive B2B Contact Data Cleaning & Enrichment. We will meticulously verify and update your existing contact data, ensuring its accuracy and completeness. We'll identify and remove expired contacts, verify both contacts and companies, and enrich existing records with missing information where available. This will involve the process of cleaning and enriching contact data. Our aim is to ensure data quality is high. By leveraging our expertise, we will transform your data into a valuable asset, ready to drive impactful outreach.

The value is clear: By investing in accurate and enriched contact data, Busra Holdings will be able to improve sales and marketing reach. Reduced bounce rates, higher engagement, and increased conversion rates will lead to a more efficient and profitable business. We price our data cleaning & enrichment at $1 per contact. This will mean a high return on investment (ROI).

Our Services & Packages

Services & Packages for Busra Holdings

Master Data Cleansing & Enrichment

Revitalize your B2B contact data. We'll clean and enrich your existing master data, ensuring accuracy and maximizing its value.

  • Verify contact and company information
  • Remove expired or invalid contacts
  • Enrich data with missing details where applicable
  • Ensure high data quality and accuracy
$1.00 / Contact

*Minimum order of 10,000 contacts applies.

Timeline & Phases

Timeline: Data Cleaning & Enrichment Project

Here’s a realistic timeline for cleaning and enriching your master B2B contact data. We'll work closely with you throughout each phase to ensure your satisfaction.

1

Phase 1: Data Assessment & Setup (Week 1)

  • Receive and analyze your master data file.
  • Conduct a sample data quality audit to identify key issues.
  • Define specific cleaning and enrichment criteria based on your needs.
  • Set up data processing infrastructure.
2

Phase 2: Contact Verification & Cleaning (Weeks 2-3)

  • Verify contact information (email, phone, etc.).
  • Identify and remove invalid or expired contacts.
  • Standardize data formats.
  • Remove duplicates.
3

Phase 3: Data Enrichment (Weeks 4-5)

  • Enrich data with missing information (e.g., job titles, company size, industry).
  • Append company information where available.
  • Implement quality control checks to ensure data accuracy.
4

Phase 4: Final Delivery & Review (Week 6)

  • Deliver the cleaned and enriched data file in your preferred format.
  • Provide a detailed data quality report.
  • Address any final questions or adjustments.
  • Final sign-off

Expected Results & Metrics

Value Metrics & ROI

We focus on delivering measurable results. Our primary goal is to improve the quality of your contact data and enhance your sales and marketing efforts. Here's a breakdown of what you can expect and how we calculate the value:

Expected Results

  • Data Verification: Verifying all contacts and companies in your master data.
  • Data Cleaning: Removing expired and invalid contacts.
  • Data Enrichment: Enriching contacts with missing information (e.g., job titles, email addresses) where available.
  • Quality Assurance: Ensuring high data quality through our rigorous process.

Metrics & ROI Calculation

Metric Assumptions Result Value to Busra Holdings
Contacts Processed Estimated Initial Dataset: 50,000 contacts 50,000 verified and cleaned contacts Improved outreach efficiency & reduced bounce rate
Data Accuracy Improvement Assumed existing accuracy: 70%. Target Accuracy post-cleaning : 95% 25% increase in usable contact data More effective lead generation and sales outreach
Enrichment Rate Estimated enrichment success rate: 10-15% 5,000 - 7,500 contacts enriched More informed and personalized outreach possible.
Overall ROI Based on client's average deal value and sales cycle, increased lead flow, less time wasted on bad data. Significant improvement in sales and marketing efficiency. Higher ROI, directly tied to increased revenue.

Cost per contact: $1.00. This project based on 50,000 contacts, is a $50,000 investment. The improved data quality translates into higher conversion rates, reduced wasted efforts, and, ultimately, a significant return on your investment. We will provide detailed reports on the data quality improvement throughout the project.

Terms & Conditions

Terms & Conditions

Payment Terms

This project is based on a project-based pricing model. Payment terms are as follows:

  • 50% of the total project cost is due upfront upon signing of the agreement.
  • The remaining 50% is due upon completion of data cleaning and enrichment, and delivery of the final, verified contact list.

Payments can be made via bank transfer or credit card. Details will be provided upon invoice.

Service Level Agreement (SLA)

We are committed to providing high-quality data cleaning and enrichment services. Our SLA includes the following:

  • Data Verification: Verification of both contact and company information against reputable sources.
  • Expired Contact Removal: Removal of contacts marked as expired or inactive based on verification.
  • Data Enrichment: Enrichment of contact data where possible, adding missing information to improve overall data quality.
  • Data Quality: Ensuring a high standard of data quality, with a focus on accuracy and completeness. We aim for a deliverable quality of above 95% on contact validity

Data Security & Confidentiality

We understand the importance of data security and confidentiality. We will:

  • Treat all client data with the utmost confidentiality.
  • Use secure data transfer methods.
  • Store client data securely and in compliance with GDPR and other relevant regulations.

Project Scope & Changes

The scope of this project is as defined in the "Services/Packages" section. Any changes to the scope will require a written agreement and may affect the pricing and timeline.

Liability

Expandia's liability is limited to the fees paid for the services. We are not liable for any indirect, consequential, or incidental damages.

Ready to Get Started?

Let's discuss how we can accelerate your growth.
